column1: '''Sigrid''' is a young girl from [[Dale]] in the [[The Hobbit (film series)
column2: ''Hobbit'']] film trilogy. She was played by [[Peggy Nesbitt]], the eldest daughter of [[James Nesbitt]].

column1: Sigrid was the eldest daughter of [[Bard]] and the sister of [[Bain]] and [[Tilda]]. She tended the family's house in [[Lake-town]] and looked after her younger sister [[Tilda]] while Bard was away at work.<ref>''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''</ref> During the onslaught of [[Smaug]], she escaped the town with her sister, the Elf [[Tauriel]] and the Dwarves. They relocated to the ruins of [[Dale]].

After the Orcs attacked Dale, Sigrid and her siblings hid in the Great Hall on the main square, although their journey there was beset with dangers.<ref>''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''</ref>
